channel.title: Discuss on limistah
channel.description: Recent content in Discuss on limistah

item.title: Programmer's Sexiness Quest
item.description: Let’s be guided, we are not getting naughty here. Nevertheless, a programmer is a human, he has his feelings and emotions which is interesting. The direction he puts these uniquely human traits makes him more interesting - towards the code and software, of course. I’ve been through a variety of programming languages, which always turned to be that the deeper I dive into a language, the more “aha” moment I get.

item.title: Frameworks - Not always the solution
item.description: Beginners do believe there is a perfect structure for setting up a project, experienced programmers know this is so far from the truth. A perfect structure is only perfect for a specific project, while project requirement varies across specifications, a perfect project setup varies across projects. Looking further down project specifications, there are repeating patterns and procedures that make all the projects look like they are all doing the same thing.
